subanswer.text: Since Charleston has 4 times as many sheep as Seattle who has 6314246 sheeps, Charleston has 4 * 6314246 = 25257084 sheeps. The answer is 25257084.

subanswer.text: It can depend largely on region due to variations in local weather patterns (climate) and fertility/composition of farmland (soil). Apples come in different colors ranging from red through yellow and even greens depending upon species and environmental influences like temperature during growth period among others.
